message.content: where are ollam's model files held in windowws

input.query: ollama model files location windows directory path

content.content:
Web search results for query: "ollama model files location windows directory path"

I'll search for information about the Ollama model files location on Windows.

Links: [{"title":"Ollama Model File Location | Restackio","url":"https://www.restack.io/p/ollama-answer-model-file-location-cat-ai"},{"title":"Can we change where the models are stored in windows · Issue #2551 · ollama/ollama","url":"https://github.com/ollama/ollama/issues/2551"},{"title":"ollama/docs/faq.md at main · ollama/ollama","url":"https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/faq.md"},{"title":"Ollama Install Location Windows | Restackio","url":"https://www.restack.io/p/ollama-answer-install-location-windows-cat-ai"},{"title":"How to Change Ollama Model Save Location on Windows: Step-by-Step Guide 2024 - SkillsFoster","url":"https://skillsfoster.com/change-model-save-location-for-ollama-on-windows/"},{"title":"Where Are Ollama Models Stored Mac | Restackio","url":"https://www.restack.io/p/ollama-models-storage-answer-cat-ai"},{"title":"Where is the default model download path in the Windows environment · Issue #3901 · ollama/ollama","url":"https://github.com/ollama/ollama/issues/3901"},{"title":"Relocating Ollama Models Folder in Windows","url":"https://www.igoroseledko.com/relocating-ollama-models-folder-in-windows/"},{"title":"Where Are Ollama Models Stored | Restackio","url":"https://www.restack.io/p/ollama-where-are-models-stored-answer-cat-ai"},{"title":"where is everything? · Issue #733 · ollama/ollama","url":"https://github.com/ollama/ollama/issues/733"}]

Based on the search results, I can provide you with comprehensive information about Ollama model files location on Windows.

## Default Ollama Model Files Location on Windows

On Windows, Ollama models are stored by default in `C:\Users\username\.ollama` or specifically in the models subfolder at `C:\Users\%username%\.ollama\models`.

## Key Directory Locations

You can access the models and configuration directory by pressing Win+R and entering: `explorer %HOMEPATH%\.ollama`. This contains all downloaded models and configuration files.

Other important Ollama directories on Windows include:

1. **Binaries**: Located at `%LOCALAPPDATA%\Programs\Ollama`, which the installer adds to your user PATH

2. **Logs and Updates**: Found at `%LOCALAPPDATA%\Ollama`, containing:
   - app.log: Contains the most recent logs from the GUI application
   - server.log: Holds the latest server logs

3. **Temporary Files**: Located in `%TEMP%`, within one or more ollama* directories

## Changing the Model Storage Location

If you need to change the location where models are stored, you can set the `OLLAMA_MODELS` environment variable to your desired directory.

To change the model storage location on Windows:

1. Start the Settings (Windows 11) or Control Panel (Windows 10) application and search for environment variables. Click on Edit environment variables for your account

2. Create a variable called `OLLAMA_MODELS` pointing to where you want to store the models

3. Edit or create a new variable for your user account for `OLLAMA_MODELS` and click OK/Apply to save

This allows you to relocate your models to a different drive or directory, which can be helpful for managing disk space since model files can be quite large.

content.text:
On Windows, Ollama models are stored in:

**Default location:** `C:\Users\%USERNAME%\.ollama\models`

**Quick access:** Press Win+R and type `%HOMEPATH%\.ollama`

**To change location:** Set the `OLLAMA_MODELS` environment variable to your preferred directory.
